name: Super Multitracking Deluxe
description:
Super Multitracking Deluxe is a short one button game where you gotta hit space at the right time to avoid the wagons of your train to derail.

It's a very short game, composed of only 3 levels, and it is the first game project I ever made by myself,  early in 2017. It also is a game I made as a school project in ISART Digital.

I'm uploading it mainly to archive it, but if you stumble upon this, I hope you have a good time trying it out :)
